channel.title: CVE Feed for Hgiga -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hgiga -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-25848|2024-08-04T15:49:05.445Z -- hgiga -- mailsherlock%20msr45%2Fssr45
item.description: HGiga MailSherlock contains weak authentication flaw that attackers grant privilege remotely with default password generation mechanism.

item.title: CVE-2021-37913|2024-08-04T01:30:08.925Z -- hgiga -- oaklouds%20oaksv2
item.description: The HGiga OAKlouds mobile portal does not filter special characters of the IPv6 Gateway parameter of the network interface card setting page. Remote attackers can use this vulnerability to perform command injection and execute arbitrary commands in the system without logging in.

item.title: CVE-2021-37912|2024-08-04T01:30:08.426Z -- hgiga -- oaklouds%20oaksv2
item.description: The HGiga OAKlouds mobile portal does not filter special characters of the Ethernet number parameter of the network interface card setting page. Remote attackers can use this vulnerability to perform command injection and execute arbitrary commands in the system without logging in.

item.title: CVE-2020-10511|2024-08-04T11:06:09.538Z -- hgiga -- c%26cmail
item.description: HGiga C&Cmail CCMAILQ before olln-base-6.0-418.i386.rpm and CCMAILN before olln-base-5.0-418.i386.rpm contains insecure configurations. Attackers can exploit these flaws to access unauthorized functionality via a crafted URL.

item.title: CVE-2020-25850|2024-08-04T15:49:05.969Z -- hgiga -- mailsherlock%20msr45%2Fssr45
item.description: The function, view the source code, of HGiga MailSherlock does not validate specific characters. Remote attackers can use this flaw to download arbitrary system files.

item.title: CVE-2020-10512|2024-08-04T11:06:09.506Z -- hgiga -- c%26cmail
item.description: HGiga C&Cmail CCMAILQ before olln-calendar-6.0-100.i386.rpm and CCMAILN before olln-calendar-5.0-100.i386.rpm contains a SQL Injection vulnerability which allows attackers to injecting SQL commands in the URL parameter to execute unauthorized commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-26260|2024-08-02T00:07:17.865Z -- hgiga -- oaklouds
item.description: The functionality for synchronization in HGiga OAKlouds' certain moudules has an OS Command Injection vulnerability, allowing remote attackers to inject system commands within specific request parameters. This enables the execution of arbitrary code on the remote server without permission.

item.title: CVE-2024-26261|2024-08-02T00:07:19.038Z -- hgiga -- oaklouds
item.description: The functionality for file download in HGiga OAKlouds' certain modules contains an Arbitrary File Read and Delete vulnerability. Attackers can put file path in specific request parameters, allowing them to download the file without login. Furthermore, the file will be deleted after being downloaded.

item.title: CVE-2024-26261|2024-07-29T20:36:21.839Z -- hgiga -- oaklouds
item.description: The functionality for file download in HGiga OAKlouds' certain modules contains an Arbitrary File Read and Delete vulnerability. Attackers can put file path in specific request parameters, allowing them to download the file without login. Furthermore, the file will be deleted after being downloaded.

item.title: CVE-2024-4298|2024-04-29T02:39:04.580Z -- hgiga -- isherlock%204.5
item.description: The email search interface of HGiga iSherlock (including MailSherlock, SpamSherock, AuditSherlock) fails to filter special characters in certain function parameters, allowing remote attackers with administrative privileges to exploit this vulnerability for Command Injection attacks, enabling execution of arbitrary system commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-4298|2024-06-04T17:56:24.316Z -- hgiga -- isherlock%204.5
item.description: The email search interface of HGiga iSherlock (including MailSherlock, SpamSherock, AuditSherlock) fails to filter special characters in certain function parameters, allowing remote attackers with administrative privileges to exploit this vulnerability for Command Injection attacks, enabling execution of arbitrary system commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-4299|2024-06-04T17:56:03.945Z -- hgiga -- isherlock%204.5
item.description: The system configuration interface of HGiga iSherlock (including MailSherlock, SpamSherock, AuditSherlock) fails to filter special characters in certain function parameters, allowing remote attackers with administrative privileges to exploit this vulnerability for Command Injection attacks, enabling execution of arbitrary system commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-4296|2024-04-29T02:08:23.300Z -- hgiga -- isherlock%204.5
item.description: The account management interface of HGiga iSherlock (including MailSherlock, SpamSherlock, AuditSherlock) fails to filter special characters in certain function parameters, allowing remote attackers with administrative privileges to exploit this vulnerability to download arbitrary system files.
